body.content:
Assalam Alaikum Wa Rahmatullahi Wa Barakatahu

Good evening  I got your
information through my
own searching,and i feel comfortable to do the business with you. I
want to
assure you about the
reality of this business. It is a genuine and benefiting business,and
am proud to say so...If
you listen to C.N.N  ALGEZERA news,you will see what is happening in
Syria.I have lost my parents because of this problems in Syria,i was
short during the war and i go for check up in the hospital by the help
of the united nations.Presently now,i and my family are in the refugee
camp.Please i would like to know what you do for a living so as to
know if you are capable to handle this transaction.I want
to inform you that the fund has been moved down to Europe under a
global consultant.I want you to tell me what I can invest with this
money
in your country and am ready to give you 35% of the total money(15.2
million dollars.If you need the documents of the money I can forward a
copy
for you to see. Please can you send your number or I.D to me so that I
can know who am dealing with. I would like you to get back to me
urgently so that i can forward the necessary documents that back up
the transaction,and also i advice to keep this business
confidential,pending when the fund gets to you.You can contact me on
this new
email, because the former email is infected with virus.Thanks from
Mr.Ali sabyani
